title: Annual Basketball Tournament
description: Competitive event for all age groups, held every summer.

title: Coaching Camps
description: Skill development camps for beginners and advanced players.

title: Friendly Matches
description: Regular friendly matches with local and regional teams.

title: Fitness Workshops
description: Workshops on fitness, nutrition, and injury prevention.

title: Family Day
description: Fun activities and games for club members and their families.

title: Charity Events
description: Fundraising matches and activities for social causes.

title: Youth Basketball League
description: Competitive league for players under 18 years.

title: Basketball Skills Challenge
description: Individual skills competition featuring dribbling, shooting, and agility tests.
